thread.title: Why not to fear the Facebook dislike
thread.title_full: Why not to fear the Facebook dislike

title: Why not to fear the Facebook dislike
text:
Why not to fear the Facebook 'dislike' 
CNBC Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Don't fear the "dislike." 
That's what advertising agencies are telling brands regarding the upcoming Facebook Reactions launch, which will allow users of the social media platform to express a wider array of emotions than merely approval. 
The reason: Negative reactions can be good for business, even if users won't always give a thumbs-up to their advertising campaigns. 
"Facebook has already provided a robust set of metrics about how a consumer interacts with your post," said The Barbarian Group director of analytics Will Sandwick. "Besides feedback like hiding and reporting post...
